Body:
I am a researcher on Computational Linguistics from India. I have built few corpora and wrote a short draft on how I made them. I am looking to get my work reviewed by any recognized international level researcher in the field. But I am not getting any clue as how to get it done by a person who is not directly or indirectly involved in my project-though an independent view matters most?

If any one of the learned members of the room can kindly suggest.

Regards, S. Banerjee.
Title: May I request a review?
